segments.text: I'm surprised by how unaware the woman is of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out steadily, forming a pool on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's climbing the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's leaning back dangerously, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand raised in excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret adventure while mom's busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in bright light, highlighting the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the outside looks so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids to be so daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must taste great to risk it.
segments.speaker: PAR
